Compute eigenvalues and eigenvectors for CA

Source: R/ca_eig.R
ca_weighted_eigen.Rd

Return eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a matrix

Usage

ca_weighted_eigen(X)

Arguments

X

X_active

Examples

library(FactoMineR2)

mtcars[, c(2, 8:11)] |>
  ca_standardize() |>
  ca_weighted_eigen()
#> $values
#> [1] 9.874269e-02 4.530753e-02 1.856613e-02 3.359061e-03 5.784999e-33
#>
